name: Candy Apple
description: Toasty, malty, and a little nutty, brown ale is a natural partner for hard cider. Combined in this simple two-ingredient cocktail, they produce a mouth-coating caramel richness cut with a sharp rinse of tart cider.
recipeIngredient: 9 ounces brown ale, like Bell's Best Brown
3 ounces dry hard cider, like Nine Pin

recipeInstructions.text: Combine both beers in a Collins or highball glass and stir gently.
